Paper.Title: TIIE ROLE OF PERSPECTIVE IN RESPONDING TO PROPERTY MISCONCEPTIONS

Section.SectionTitle: TIIE ROLE OF PERSPECTIVE IN RESPONDING TO PROPERTY MISCONCEPTIONS
Section.Paragraph: This work is partially supported by the ARO grant DAA20-84-K-0061 and by the NSF grant #MCS81-07290.
This paper appears in The Proceedings of IJCAI-85, August 18-23, 1985, University of California, Los Angeles, Ca.
